name: Recharge Studios
overview: Recharge Studios collaborates with indie developers, IP owners and publishers to bring great social games to life on iOS. As an investment fund, capitalized by W3i, Recharge Studios assists our partners in developing and marketing their games while giving partners full ownership of IP. In addition to the financial capital provided, partners benefit from W3i’s expertise as a market leader in app distribution. With more than 11 years of experience distributing mobile, browser and desktop apps, W3i and Recharge Studios provide app developers a leg up in the competitive app world.

milestones.description: Recharge Studios announces strong first quarter partnerships.
milestones.source_description: W3iâ€™s Recharge Studios Funds 12 Titles, Plans to Have 20 Games Out in 6 Months
